1.0.3.en: Added a new button for toggling massage functionality on/off, Updated the app description

1.0.5.en: Minor code adjustments to catch errors and prevent crashes

1.0.6.en: some new checks to minimize potential error messages

1.0.7.en: Resolved issues related to logging into the EU server

1.1.0.en: Push notification with the current error code if the pump stops due to an error. Support for Fahrenheit units, Enhanced logging and error handling for better debugging.
